name: Knights of Fate
description:
PRESENTATION:


This is a classic 2D retro RPG in the vein of Skyfall, Ashes of Immortality and Last Heroes.

FEATURES:


  • Classical Storyline
  • Sidequests to Complete
  • Mouse Support
  • Quest Journal to track your progress
  • An Exciting Fantasy World to explore!

SUMMARY:


The Triskelion Knights are an elite force selected and trained to protect the country. They're the King's right hand and they are now called to the biggest mission of their lives, to stop a Shaman from regaining his full powers and starting another war for the souls of the people. However, all is not as it seems...
